name: Lexus GS F
description: A Lexus GS 350 will depreciate 40% after 5 years and have a 5 year resale value of $32,592. The chart below shows the expected depreciation for the next 10 years. These results are for vehicles in good condition, averaging 12,000 miles per year. It also assumes a selling price of $54,393 when new. Enter your purchase price, expected ownership period and estimated miles driven annually.

name: Toyota Prius specs
description: The 2022 Toyota Prius delivers phenomenal fuel economy and offers up a lot of passenger and cargo space, but it falls to the bottom half of the hybrid and electric car class because of a weak powertrain and so-so interior quality.

name: Audi Q7 2018
description: Slotting above the compact Q5, the 2018 Audi Q7 is a three-row crossover with seating for seven passengers and standard all-wheel drive. Two engines are available on the 2018 Q7 including a 2.0-liter turbo-four rated at 252 hp and 273 lb-ft of torque and a 3.0-liter supercharged V-6 with 333 hp and 325 lb-ft.
